title: I Can See, I Can Hear
itunes:title: I Can See, I Can Hear
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, my husband and I are headed towards a divorce if he doesn’t stop lying to me and playing me for a fool. I work the third shift as a dispatcher but I make sure our children are ready for bed before I leave. I think I’m a great mom and an even better wife, so I get offended when my husband acts like I am falling short on my wifely duties........................................

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, my husband and I are headed towards a divorce if he doesn’t stop lying to me and playing me for a fool. I work the third shift as a dispatcher but I make sure our children are ready for bed before I leave.
